MACD is one of the most popular and reliable indicators for trading. M.A.C.D. is abbreviation for Moving Average Convergence Divergence. It is fairly easy to learn and add into your trading plan to make great decisions.

This indicator involves plotting two momentum lines.

The MACD line is the difference between two exponential moving averages and the signal or trigger line, which is an exponential moving average of the difference.

If the MACD and trigger lines cross, then this is taken as a signal that a change in the trend is likely.
